Property.Name: BodyScript
HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON; SELECT TOP 1 g.firstName, g.lastName, b.arrivalDate, b.departureDate, h.name AS homestay, ht.title as homestayType, l.locationName, ho.firstName as hostFirstName, ho.lastName as hostLastName, b.totalCost FROM Booking b INNER JOIN Homestays h ON b.homestayId = h.id INNER JOIN HomestayType ht ON h.homestayTypeId = ht.Id INNER JOIN Location l ON h.locationId = l.Id INNER JOIN Hosts ho ON h.hostId = ho.Id INNER JOIN Guests g On b.guestId = g.Id WHERE b.Id = @Id AND g.firstName = @firstName AND g.lastName = @lastName; END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
